t: How to find archived orders on Amazon - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 4): Step 1. Log into your Amazon account Step 2. Click on Orders Step 3. Under “Your Orders” there will be a box with a drop-down menu. Go all the way to the bottom of the list. The last one will be “Archived Orders.” Step 4. After you find it in this obvious location, ...
